data.title: Bill Gates (Founder of Microsoft and Computer Scientist)
data.meta_description: Gates co-founded Microsoft in 1975 along with Paul Allen. They developed BASIC then later MS-DOS for IBM before launching Microsoft Windows in 1995. Windows...
data.text:
Bill Gates

Full Name: William Henry Gates

Profession: Founder of Microsoft and Computer Scientist

Biography: Gates co-founded Microsoft in 1975 along with Paul Allen.

They developed BASIC then later MS-DOS for IBM before launching Microsoft Windows in 1995. Windows went on to become the most dominate personal computer operating system, with Microsoft using at times controversial anticompetitive tactics.

Gates, now one of the richest men in the world, stepped aside as CEO in 2000 and established the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation for Philanthropic purposes.

Born: October 28, 1955

Birthplace: Seattle, Washington, USA

Age: 68 years old

Generation: Baby Boomer

Chinese Zodiac: Goat/Sheep

Star Sign: Scorpio

Articles and Photos

Founding of Microsoft

Paul Allen and Bill Gates, the founders of Microsoft

Historical Events

Microsoft is founded as a partnership between Bill Gates and Paul Allen to develop and sell BASIC interpreters for the Altair 8800

Bill Gates buys Leonardo da Vinci's "Codex" for $30,800,000 - then the most expensive manuscript ever sold

Forbes Magazine announces Bill Gates is the richest man in world with a net worth of $12.9 billion dollars

Bill Gates gets a pie thrown in his face in Brussels, Belgium

Bill Gates testifies at Senate Judiciary Committee about Microsoft's dominant position in the software industry

Microsoft chairman Bill Gates steps aside as chief executive and promotes company president Steve Ballmer to the position

Carlos Slim overtakes Bill Gates as world's richest person with estimated net worth of US$59 billion, according to "Fortune"

Bill Gates steps down as Chairman of Microsoft Corporation to work full time for the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

Bill Gates regains his position as the world's richest man with $72.7 billion after losing the position in 2008

Forbes Richest List released, Bill Gates No. 1 with $75 billion, number of world's billionaires shrinks to 1,810

Amazon founder Jeff Bezos briefly becomes world's richest person at $91.4B USD, overtaking Bill Gates for half a day

Forbes names Amazon founder Jeff Bezos the world's richest person for the first time at $112 billion, Bill Gates no. 2

Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates steps down from the company's board to focus on philanthropic activities

Microsoft founder Bill Gates says development of artificial intelligence (AI) is the most important technological advance since the graphical user interface (GUI) in 1980

Personal Life

Microsoft CEO Bill Gates (38) marries Melinda French (29)

Bill Gates and his wife Melinda Gates announce their divorce after 27 years

Biographies and Sources

The Age of AI has begun - gatesnotes.com
